translated: Surviving with Wolves (original title: Misha: A Memory of the Holocaust Years), is a novel by Misha Defonseca, which has long claimed that it was a true story.
original: Survivre avec les loups (titre original : Misha: A Mémoire of the Holocaust Years), est un roman de Misha Defonseca, qui a longtemps prétendu que c'était une histoire vraie.
